goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
target: By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
title: Untitled
indicator_name: Level of implementation of the Annual Statistical Work Program
national_indicator_available: 17.18.3.2 Level of implementation of the Annual Statistical Work Program
computation_calculations: Number of implemented actions from the Annual Statistical Work Program out of the total number of actions planned within it *100.
computation_definitions: The indicator is a cumulative indicator for the entire reporting period of the Action Plan of the National Strategy for Development of the NSS.
graph_title: 17.18.3.2 Level of implementation of the Annual Statistical Work Program
source_data_source_1: Normative framework in the area of statistics - NBS
comparison_global: The national indicator is complementary from the information point of view for the global indicator
